name: 6 Celli - Nucleus
description: Audio Imperia Nucleus 6 Celli ensemble. Deep, rich tone with exceptional expressiveness and progressive vibrato. Perfect for emotional melodies and powerful bass foundation.

ai.system_prompt_template: IMPORTANT: Always list articulation_changes BEFORE every articulation change (with exact time). Always specify current articulation explicitly. If starting with legato - add an articulation change entry, switching to spiccato - add an articulation change entry, if long notes appear within short notes section - switch to sustained/legato, then back to short articulation. Never assume previous articulation persists - always add an articulation change entry when articulation type changes. Ensemble celli (6 players). CC1 controls dynamics for long articulations. Progressive vibrato on legato. Use velocity for short articulations.
